views.name: geography_columns
views.definition:
SELECT current_database() AS f_table_catalog,
    n.nspname AS f_table_schema,
    c.relname AS f_table_name,
    a.attname AS f_geography_column,
    postgis_typmod_dims(a.atttypmod) AS coord_dimension,
    postgis_typmod_srid(a.atttypmod) AS srid,
    postgis_typmod_type(a.atttypmod) AS type
   FROM pg_class c,
    pg_attribute a,
    pg_type t,
    pg_namespace n
  WHERE t.typname = 'geography'::name AND a.attisdropped = false AND a.atttypid = t.oid AND a.attrelid = c.oid AND c.relnamespace = n.oid AND (c.relkind = ANY (ARRAY['r'::"char", 'v'::"char", 'm'::"char", 'f'::"char", 'p'::"char"])) AND NOT pg_is_other_temp_schema(c.relnamespace) AND has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'SELECT'::text);

views.name: geometry_columns
views.definition:
SELECT current_database()::character varying(256) AS f_table_catalog,
    n.nspname AS f_table_schema,
    c.relname AS f_table_name,
    a.attname AS f_geometry_column,
    COALESCE(postgis_typmod_dims(a.atttypmod), sn.ndims, 2) AS coord_dimension,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(postgis_typmod_srid(a.atttypmod), 0), sr.srid, 0) AS srid,
    replace(replace(COALESCE(NULLIF(upper(postgis_typmod_type(a.atttypmod)), 'GEOMETRY'::text), st.type, 'GEOMETRY'::text), 'ZM'::text, ''::text), 'Z'::text, ''::text)::character varying(30) AS type
   FROM pg_class c
     JOIN pg_attribute a ON a.attrelid = c.oid AND NOT a.attisdropped
     JOIN pg_namespace n ON c.relnamespace = n.oid
     JOIN pg_type t ON a.atttypid = t.oid
     LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.connamespace,
            s.conrelid,
            s.conkey,
            replace(split_part(s.consrc, ''''::text, 2), ')'::text, ''::text) AS type
           FROM ( SELECT pg_constraint.connamespace,
                    pg_constraint.conrelid,
                    pg_constraint.conkey,
                    pg_get_constraintdef(pg_constraint.oid) AS consrc
                   FROM pg_constraint) s
          WHERE s.consrc ~~* '%geometrytype(% = %'::text) st ON st.connamespace = n.oid AND st.conrelid = c.oid AND (a.attnum = ANY (st.conkey))
     LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.connamespace,
            s.conrelid,
            s.conkey,
            replace(split_part(s.consrc, ' = '::text, 2), ')'::text, ''::text)::integer AS ndims
           FROM ( SELECT pg_constraint.connamespace,
                    pg_constraint.conrelid,
                    pg_constraint.conkey,
                    pg_get_constraintdef(pg_constraint.oid) AS consrc
                   FROM pg_constraint) s
          WHERE s.consrc ~~* '%ndims(% = %'::text) sn ON sn.connamespace = n.oid AND sn.conrelid = c.oid AND (a.attnum = ANY (sn.conkey))
     LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.connamespace,
            s.conrelid,
            s.conkey,
            replace(replace(split_part(s.consrc, ' = '::text, 2), ')'::text, ''::text), '('::text, ''::text)::integer AS srid
           FROM ( SELECT pg_constraint.connamespace,
                    pg_constraint.conrelid,
                    pg_constraint.conkey,
                    pg_get_constraintdef(pg_constraint.oid) AS consrc
                   FROM pg_constraint) s
          WHERE s.consrc ~~* '%srid(% = %'::text) sr ON sr.connamespace = n.oid AND sr.conrelid = c.oid AND (a.attnum = ANY (sr.conkey))
  WHERE (c.relkind = ANY (ARRAY['r'::"char", 'v'::"char", 'm'::"char", 'f'::"char", 'p'::"char"])) AND NOT c.relname = 'raster_columns'::name AND t.typname = 'geometry'::name AND NOT pg_is_other_temp_schema(c.relnamespace) AND has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'SELECT'::text);

policies.name: Host can invite others
policies.check:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM events
  WHERE ((events.id = event_participants.event_id) AND (events.created_by = auth.uid()))))

triggers.name: trg_set_required_qty
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER trg_set_required_qty BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE OF per_guest_qty ON public.event_items FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trg_set_required_qty_on_items()

triggers.name: set_timestamp_join_requests
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp_join_requests BEFORE UPDATE ON public.event_join_requests FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_set_timestamp()

triggers.name: trg_attendee_count
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER trg_attendee_count AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON public.event_participants FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trg_update_attendee_count()

triggers.name: trg_recalc_on_events
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER trg_recalc_on_events AFTER UPDATE OF attendee_count, min_guests ON public.events FOR EACH ROW WHEN (((old.attendee_count <> new.attendee_count) OR (old.min_guests <> new.min_guests))) EXECUTE FUNCTION trg_recalc_required_qty()

triggers.name: set_timestamp_item_catalog
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp_item_catalog BEFORE UPDATE ON public.item_catalog FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_set_timestamp()

triggers.name: set_timestamp_notifications
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp_notifications BEFORE UPDATE ON public.notifications FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_set_timestamp()

triggers.name: set_timestamp_user_items
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp_user_items BEFORE UPDATE ON public.user_items FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_set_timestamp()

functions.name: availability_for_event
functions.source:
WITH event_capacity AS (
        SELECT capacity_total as total
        FROM public.events 
        WHERE id = event_uuid
    ),
    confirmed_participants AS (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(party_size), 0) as confirmed
        FROM public.event_participants 
        WHERE event_id = event_uuid 
        AND status = 'accepted'
    ),
    active_holds AS (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(party_size), 0) as held
        FROM public.event_join_requests 
        WHERE event_id = event_uuid 
        AND status = 'pending' 
        AND hold_expires_at > now()
    )
    SELECT 
        ec.total,
        cp.confirmed,
        ah.held,
        GREATEST(0, ec.total - cp.confirmed - ah.held) as available
    FROM event_capacity ec
    CROSS JOIN confirmed_participants cp  
    CROSS JOIN active_holds ah;
functions.comment: Calculate event capacity: total, confirmed, held, available
functions.returns: TABLE(total integer, confirmed integer, held integer, available integer)

functions.name: create_event_with_items
functions.source:
DECLARE
  v_event      public.events%ROWTYPE;
  v_location   uuid;
  v_items      jsonb;
BEGIN
  -- 1  Resolve or insert location -----------------------------------------
/* ---------- 1  Resolve or insert location -------------------------------- */
/* ---------- 1  Resolve or insert location -------------------------------- */
WITH loc AS (
  SELECT
    _payload->'location'                     AS l,
    (_payload->'location'->>'place_id')      AS g_id,
    (_payload->'location'->>'name')          AS raw_name,
    NULLIF(_payload->'location'->>'formatted_address','') AS f_addr,
    (_payload->'location'->>'latitude') :: double precision  AS lat,
    (_payload->'location'->>'longitude'):: double precision  AS lon
),

-- ---------- try insert via place_id if provided ----------
ins_by_place AS (
  INSERT INTO public.locations
        (place_id, name, formatted_address, latitude, longitude, created_by)
  SELECT  g_id, raw_name, f_addr, lat, lon, _actor_id
  FROM   loc
  WHERE  g_id IS NOT NULL
  ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT uniq_locations_placeid


  DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id
),

-- ---------- if no place_id (or null) fall back to grid+name ----------
ins_by_grid AS (
  INSERT INTO public.locations
        (name, formatted_address, latitude, longitude, created_by)
  SELECT  raw_name, f_addr, lat, lon, _actor_id
  FROM   loc l
  WHERE  l.g_id IS NULL      -- only when we couldn't use place_id
  ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT uniq_locations_grid_name
  DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id
)

SELECT COALESCE(
         (SELECT id FROM ins_by_place),
         (SELECT id FROM ins_by_grid),
         (  -- existing row by place_id
            SELECT id FROM public.locations p
            CROSS JOIN loc l2
            WHERE p.place_id = l2.g_id
         ),
         (  -- existing row by grid+canonical name
            SELECT p.id
            FROM   public.locations p
            CROSS JOIN loc l2
            WHERE  p.lat6 = round(l2.lat::numeric, 6)
              AND  p.lon6 = round(l2.lon::numeric, 6)
              AND  p.canonical_name =
                   lower(trim(regexp_replace(l2.raw_name, '\s+',' ','g')))
            LIMIT 1
         )
       )
INTO v_location;




  -- 2  Insert event ---------------------------------------------------------
  INSERT INTO public.events (
    title, description, location_id, event_date,
    min_guests, max_guests, meal_type,
    status, created_by
  ) VALUES (
    _payload->>'title',
    NULLIF(_payload->>'description','') ,
    v_location,
    (_payload->>'event_date')::timestamptz,
    (_payload->>'min_guests')::int,
    NULLIF((_payload->>'max_guests')::int, 0),
    (_payload->>'meal_type')::meal_type,
    'draft',
    _actor_id
  ) RETURNING * INTO v_event;

  -- 2b  Auto RSVP host --------------------------------------------------------
INSERT INTO public.event_participants
        (event_id, user_id, role, status)
VALUES  (v_event.id, _actor_id, 'host', 'accepted'::rsvp_status);


  -- 3  Insert item slots ----------------------------------------------------
  INSERT INTO public.event_items (
    event_id, name, category, per_guest_qty, required_qty, created_by
  )
  SELECT v_event.id,
         (itm->>'name')::text,
         NULLIF(itm->>'category',''),
         (itm->>'per_guest_qty')::numeric,
         (itm->>'per_guest_qty')::numeric * (_payload->>'min_guests')::int,
         _actor_id
  FROM jsonb_array_elements(_payload->'items') itm;

  -- 4  Aggregate items to return -------------------------------------------
  SELECT jsonb_agg(to_jsonb(ei.*)) INTO v_items
  FROM   public.event_items ei
  WHERE  ei.event_id = v_event.id;

  -- 5  Return composite -----------------------------------------------------
  RETURN jsonb_build_object(
    'event', to_jsonb(v_event),
    'items', v_items
  );

EXCEPTION WHEN others THEN
  RAISE;
END;

functions.name: expire_join_request_holds
functions.source:
WITH updated AS (
        UPDATE public.event_join_requests 
        SET status = 'expired', updated_at = now()
        WHERE status = 'pending' 
        AND hold_expires_at IS NOT NULL 
        AND hold_expires_at <= now()
        RETURNING 1
    )
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM updated;
functions.comment: Background job function to expire pending holds

functions.name: find_nearby_events
functions.source:
WITH user_point AS (
    SELECT ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(user_lon, user_lat), 4326)::geography AS geom,
           radius_km * 1000 AS radius_m
  )
  SELECT
    e.id,
    e.title,
    e.description,
    e.event_date,
    l.formatted_address AS city,
    ST_Distance(
      ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(l.longitude, l.latitude), 4326)::geography,
      up.geom
    ) AS distance_m,
    e.is_public,
    e.status,
    e.capacity_total,
    e.attendee_count
  FROM public.events e
  JOIN public.locations l ON l.id = e.location_id
  CROSS JOIN user_point up
  WHERE e.status = 'published'
    AND e.is_public = true
    AND l.latitude IS NOT NULL
    AND l.longitude IS NOT NULL
    AND ST_DWithin(
      ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(l.longitude, l.latitude), 4326)::geography,
      up.geom,
      up.radius_m
    )
  ORDER BY distance_m ASC, e.event_date ASC
  LIMIT limit_count
  OFFSET offset_count;
functions.returns: TABLE(id uuid, title text, description text, event_date timestamp with time zone, city text, distance_m double precision, is_public boolean, status text, capacity_total integer, attendee_count integer)
functions.arguments: user_lat double precision, user_lon double precision, radius_km integer, limit_count integer, offset_count integer

functions.name: find_nearby_users_for_latlon
functions.source:
WITH event_point AS (
    SELECT ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(p_lon, p_lat), 4326)::geography AS geom,
           p_radius_km * 1000 AS event_radius_m
  )
  SELECT
    up.user_id,
    ST_Distance(up.home_geog, ep.geom) AS distance_m
  FROM public.user_profiles up, event_point ep
  WHERE up.discoverability_enabled = true
    AND up.home_geog IS NOT NULL
    AND ST_DWithin(
      up.home_geog,
      ep.geom,
      LEAST(up.discoverability_radius_km * 1000, ep.event_radius_m)
    );
functions.arguments: p_lat double precision, p_lon double precision, p_radius_km integer

functions.arguments: p_event_id uuid, p_user_id uuid, p_party_size integer, p_note text, p_hold_ttl_minutes integer, p_auto_approve boolean
